   20: 
   21: -module(skip_group_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: -include("ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: suite() ->
   28:     [].
   29: 
   30: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   31:     Config.
   32: 
   33: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   34:     ok.
   35: 
   36: group(test_group_1) ->
   37:     [{require,whatever}];
   38: group(test_group_2) ->
   39:     faulty_return_value;
   40: group(_) ->
   41:     [].
   42: 
   43: init_per_group(test_group_3,Config) ->
   44:     {skip,"Skipped in init_per_group/2"};
   45: init_per_group(_,Config) ->
   46:     ct:fail("This shall never be run due to auto_skip from group/1").
   47: 
   48: end_per_group(_,_) ->
   49:     ct:fail("This shall never be run").
   50: 
   51: all() ->
   52:     [{group,test_group_1},
   53:      {group,test_group_2},
   54:      {group,test_group_3}].
   55: 
   56: groups() ->
   57:     [{test_group_1,[test_case]},
   58:      {test_group_2,[test_case]},
   59:      {test_group_3,[test_case]}].
   60: 
   61: %% Test cases starts here.
   62: test_case(_Config) ->    
   63:     ct:fail("This test case shall never be run due to skip on group level").
   64:
